p: The antihyperglycemic activity was assessed on the 1st day of the antidiabetic study. After the first measurement on the 1st day and selection of the groups, the treatments were administered right away, and series of measures were conducted after 1 h, 1 h 30, 3 h, and 12 h to evaluate the response of the high blood glucose animal to the different treatments in a short and long time.
